"Creating the ★15 Atlas EX Weapons":
"If you bring one of the ★14 \"Atlas\" weapon series to the NPC Zieg, you can upgrade it into the ★15 Atlas EX series.

In addition to the ★14 \"Atlas\" weapon at +35, you need a ★14 \"Lumiere\" series weapon at +35, as well as 400 Excubes.

※All weapons must be of the same type.

※Bear in mind while you can change Atlas and Atlas EX weapons from one type to another, Takts are an exception. Takts do not have Special Abilities or an attribute, so they cannot be changed into any other type of weapon."
